# items

**Instance Property**

The list of items for the section.

## Declaration

```swift
var items: [any CPListTemplateItem] { get }
```

## Getting Items

- **index(of:)**: Returns the index of the specified item.
- **item(at:)**: Returns the item at the specified index.

items.description: Returns the index of the specified item.
items.name: index(of:)

items.description: Returns the item at the specified index.
items.name: item(at:)
